description: Try our easy to follow Honey Apple Drumsticks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken drumsticks,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Apple,Chicken
name: Honey Apple Drumsticks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine apple sauce, honey, sugar, vinegar and mustard in a large bowl. Add drumsticks and stir to coat well with marinade. Cover and marinate in the fridge for 1 hour if time permits.

Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a large tray with baking paper. Place drumsticks on tray and bake, basting with marinade every 10 minutes, for 40 minutes or until golden and cooked through, turning over half way through cooking time.
Meanwhile, quarter apples and core. Thinly slice and place in a large bowl with onion, mint, mayonnaise, salt and pepper. Toss until combined. Serve drumsticks with apple salad.
